page.title: 14SOUTHAM
page.content: AT THE FOOT OF CLEEVE HILL IS A PRETTY VILLAGE CALLED SOUTHAM.THE HOUSES ARE VERY EXPENSIVE. MANY OF THEM ARE BUILT OF COTSWOLD STONE AND HAVE ATTRACTIVE COUNTRY GARDENS.ALTHOUGH SOUTHAM HAS FEW FACILITIES IT IS AN IDEAL CENTRE FOR WALKING AND TOURING.MUCH OF THE LAND AROUND HERE IS OWNED BY MANOR FARM. THE HOTEL DE LA BERE WAS ORIGINALLY A TUDOR MANOR HOUSE BUILT IN 1485.IT HAS 15 ACRES OF GROUNDS.IT IS A HOTEL OF HIGH STANDARD AND CAN CATER FOR ALL REQUIREMENTS.IT HAS ITS OWN SPORTS AND COUNTRY CLUB WITH COURTS FOR SQUASH,TENNIS AND BADMINTON. THERE IS A GYMNASIUM AND SWIMMING POOL AND PITCH AND PUTT COURSE.NOT FAR AWAY IS SOUTHAM RIDING SCHOOL WHICH MANY LOCAL PEOPLE USE.
